content: The Enslaved Yaksha is armed with a massive metal spike, and he's not afraid to use it. The sheer size of the spike means the Enslaved Yaksha has a lot of reach. Use Immobilize to freeze him in place so you can wail on him safely and watch out for the other enemies that lurk in the cell with him.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Enslaved_Yaksha_Spirit.md", within the section "Enslaved Yaksha Spirit" and the sub-section "Enslaved Yaksha Fight". The content is presented below:

The Enslaved Yaksha is armed with a massive metal spike, and he's not afraid to use it. The sheer size of the spike means the Enslaved Yaksha has a lot of reach. Use Immobilize to freeze him in place so you can wail on him safely and watch out for the other enemies that lurk in the cell with him.
